name: Touge Challenge
description:
Touge Challenge is inspired by the popular racers of the mid 2000s. Participate in illegal street racing on the mountain passes at night, complete the Challenge Series, and become the undisputed master of the Touge.

  • Beat your rivals in 60 unique Challenge Series events.
  • Over 45 different popular car-culture inspired vehicles.
  • 8 different tracks.
  • Easy to play, hard to master driving physics.
  • 6 different event types; 1 VS 1 Mode, Time Trial, Timed Relay, Drift, Speedtrap, Outrun, and combinations of each.
  • Outrun the cops.

Touge Challenge is designed to be played with a gamepad/controller. You can also play with the keyboard. Wheels are not currently supported.
